properties.entry: SELECT ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME FROM ORDER_FORM, PRODUCT WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT O.NAME ,O.ADDRESS ,O.PHONE ,O.ORDER_MEMO ,B.BUY_DATE ,B.BUY_METHOD ,P.PRODUCT_NO FROM ORDER_FORM O JOIN ORDER_LIST L ON (O.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO) JOIN BUY B ON (O.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION P ON (L.PRODUCT_AMOUNT = P.PRODUCT_NO)
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = '1'
